title: Deploying ASP.NET website using SkiaSharp and libSkikSharp.dll in Windows Server 2012 shows "BadImageFormatException". This is probably due to wrong bit of the libSkiaSharp.dll. I have tried replacing with dlls of win7, win 10 (32-bit and 64-bit). How do I resolve this issue?
